title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama server.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for interacting with a local Ollama instance.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLM or embeddings in LangChain apps.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style interface) with model management, RAG, multi-user support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java client library for Ollama, allowing JVM apps to chat and manage models.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI tool for chatting with Ollama models, written in Rust.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem providing idiomatic access to the Ollama API.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into a local GitHub Copilot alternative.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot bringing Ollama LLM chat to any server with slash commands.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes clusters.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset to use Ollama models in retrieval-augmented generation pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes and examples for building apps with Ollama (LangChain, LlamaIndex, Docker, etc.).

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix package derivation for installing Ollama declaratively on NixOS or via nix-shell.

title: ollama-model-hub
summary: Curated list of community-created Modelfiles for running custom or fine-tuned models in Ollama.

title: ollama-rag-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that performs local RAG over your vault using Ollama embeddings and chat.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Production-ready Docker Compose stack bundling Ollama, Open WebUI, Weaviate, and Nginx.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Unofficial C#/.NET client for Ollama with strongly-typed models and streaming chat.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot that exposes Ollama models as slash commands and threaded chat inside workspaces.

title: ollama-llamaindex
summary: Official LlamaIndex integration to use Ollama LLMs and embeddings in knowledge agents.
